pages.text: Hello! I was going to write this in a google doc or something, but I thought it might be fun to share my process with you all. $(br2)The story is based on a lot of other media I like - I won't bother listing them all here. The storyline, roughly, is as follows.

$(li)Asteri becomes interested in the gods after hearing the end poem. $()$(br)$(li)Asteri finds a number of crests after some research, but doesn't know how to make them. $()$(br)$(li)After finding the neccessary components for your pantheon, Asteri makes their first crest.

$(li)When the crest doesn't do anything, Asteri realizes the crests themselves are just marks of the pantheon and that the ascension needs something else $()$(br)$(li)Asteri creates the Ascension pedestal $()$(br)$(li)(more to come)
